verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> Fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחָ֔ת <S%H2865><s%> not neither be thou dismayed קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> take עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וְק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> with thee and arise עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> go up הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> to Ai רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> see נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given בְיָדְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> into thy hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָעַי֙ <S%H5857><s%> of Ai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> and his city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> and his land

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt do לָעַ֜י <S%H5857><s%> to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֗הּ <S%H4428><s%> and her king כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> as thou didst לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> unto Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <S%H4428><s%> and her king רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> its שְׁלָלָ֥הּ <S%H7998><s%> only the spoil וּבְהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <S%H929><s%> thereof and the cattle תָּבֹ֣זּוּ <S%H962><s%> thereof shall ye take for a prey לָכֶ֑ם שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> unto yourselves lay לְךָ֥ אֹרֵ֛ב <S%H693><s%> thee an ambush לָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> for the city מֵאַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H310><s%> behind

וַיָּ֧קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> against Ai וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> chose out יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> mighty הַחַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֖ם <S%H7971><s%> and sent them away לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

וַיְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> And he commanded אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> them saying רְ֠אוּ <S%H7200><s%> Behold אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹרְבִ֤ים <S%H693><s%> ye shall lie in wait לָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> against the city מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> [even] behind הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> the city אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּרְחִ֥יקוּ <S%H7368><s%> far מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> from the city מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> not very וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all נְכֹנִֽים׃ <S%H3559><s%> but be ye all ready

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And I and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> for נִקְרַ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> that [are] with me will approach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and when יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> and it shall come to pass when they come out לִקְרָאתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H7125><s%> against כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <S%H5127><s%> that we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְיָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> (For they will come out אַחֲרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H310><s%> after עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַתִּיקֵ֤נוּ <S%H5423><s%> us) till we have drawn אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> them from the city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> for they will say נָסִ֣ים <S%H5127><s%> They flee לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> us בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <S%H5127><s%> therefore we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> and you תָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> Then ye shall rise up מֵהָ֣אוֹרֵ֔ב <S%H693><s%> from the ambush וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֖ם <S%H3423><s%> and seize אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> upon the city וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <S%H5414><s%> will deliver יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> it into your hand

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְּתָפְשְׂכֶ֣ם <S%H8610><s%> And it shall be when ye have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> the city תַּצִּ֤יתוּ <S%H3341><s%> [that] ye shall set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> the city בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> on fire כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall ye do רְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> See צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <S%H7971><s%> therefore sent them forth יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <S%H3993><s%> to lie in ambush וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> and abode בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <S%H1008><s%> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָעַ֖י <S%H5857><s%> and Ai מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> on the west side לָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> of Ai וַיָּ֧לֶן <S%H3885><s%> lodged יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> but Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> and numbered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up ה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְזִקְנֵ֧י <S%H2205><s%> he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> to Ai

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> [even the people] of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for עָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> that [were] with him went up וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H5066><s%> and drew nigh וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> front הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> before the city וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north side לָעַ֔י <S%H5857><s%> of Ai וְהַגַּ֖י <S%H1516><s%> now [there was] a valley [בֵּינֹו כ] (בֵּינָ֥יו <S%H996><s%> between ק) וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> between them and Ai

וַיִּקַּ֕ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took כַּחֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> about five אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> אֹרֵ֗ב <S%H693><s%> them to lie in ambush בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <S%H1008><s%> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָעַ֖י <S%H5857><s%> and Ai מִיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> on the west side לָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> And when they had set הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> [even] all the host אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that was מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> that [was] on the north לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲקֵב֖וֹ <S%H6119><s%> and their liers in wait מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> on the west לָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> spent יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> of the valley

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when the king הָעַ֗י <S%H5857><s%> of Ai וַֽיְמַהֲר֡וּ <S%H4116><s%> [it] that they hasted וַיַּשְׁכִּ֡ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> and rose up early וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> and the men הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city לִקְרַֽאת־ <S%H7125><s%> against יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לַֽמִּלְחָמָ֞ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> he and all his people לַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> at a time appointed לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H6160><s%> the plain וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> but he wist כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֹרֵ֥ב <S%H693><s%> not that [there were] liers in ambush ל֖וֹ מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> against him behind הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וַיִּנָּֽגְע֛וּ <S%H5060><s%> made as if they were beaten יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> them and fled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness

וַיִּזָּעֲק֗וּ <S%H2199><s%> were called כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who [בָּעִיר כ] (בָּעַ֔י <S%H5892><s%> the city ק) לִרְדֹּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> together to pursue אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after וַֽיִּרְדְּפוּ֙ <S%H7291><s%> them and they pursued אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וַיִּנָּתְק֖וּ <S%H5423><s%> and were drawn away מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> were in הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> from the city

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁאַ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> left אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And there was not a man בָּעַי֙ <S%H5857><s%> in Ai וּבֵ֣ית אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> or Bethel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> that went not out אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> and they left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> the city פְּתוּחָ֔ה <S%H6605><s%> open וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <S%H7291><s%> and pursued אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> after Israel פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua נְ֠טֵה <S%H5186><s%> Stretch out בַּכִּיד֤וֹן <S%H3591><s%> the spear אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is in בְּיָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> that [is] in thy hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הָעַ֔י <S%H5857><s%> toward Ai כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> into בְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> it into thine hand אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <S%H5414><s%> for I will give וַיֵּ֧ט <S%H5186><s%> stretched out יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בַּכִּיד֥וֹן <S%H3591><s%> the spear אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was בְּיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> that [he had] in his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> toward the city

וְהָאוֹרֵ֡ב <S%H693><s%> And the ambush קָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> arose מְהֵרָ֨ה <S%H4120><s%> quickly מִמְּקוֹמ֤וֹ <S%H4725><s%> out of their place וַיָּר֙וּצוּ֙ <S%H7323><s%> and they ran כִּנְט֣וֹת <S%H5186><s%> as soon as he had stretched out יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they entered הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וַֽיִּלְכְּד֑וּהָ <S%H3920><s%> and took וַֽיְמַהֲר֔וּ <S%H4116><s%> it and hasted וַיַּצִּ֥יתוּ <S%H3341><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> on fire
